articles.title: Argentina officials meeting with investors in New York, after IMF loan talks
articles.description: Argentine government officials including Finance Minister Martin Guzman are meeting private investors on Friday in New York, the government said.
articles.content:
NEW YORK, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Argentine government officials including Finance Minister Martin Guzman are meeting private investors on Friday in New York, the government said.
Guzman is flanked by Cabinet Chief Juan Manzur and Argentine ambassador to ... [798 chars]

articles.title: The joy is back for Neymar in World Cup qualifying
articles.description: Neymar will return to action with Brazil in November, when his team will qualify for the World Cup if it scores a home win over Colombia in the next round. A few days later he will face Messi's Argentina in San Juan.
articles.content:
Neymar started the week facing criticism after a poor performance in a World Cup qualifying match and his suggestion that the next tournament in Qatar might be his last.
But the striker helped erase many of those thoughts by providing key elements in... [3067 chars]

articles.title: 'Closer than ever' - Emi Martinez sends message ahead of Aston Villa return
articles.description: Goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez is on his way back from Argentina ahead of Aston Villa's Premier League clash with Wolves this weekend
articles.content:
Emiliano Martinez has sent a message ahead of his return to Aston Villa for this weekend's Premier League clash with Wolves.

articles.title: Lionel Messi benefits as Emi Martinez repeats trick that thwarted Bruno Fernandes & Man Utd
articles.description: Argentina kept their third clean sheet in as many games against Peru overnight and Aston Villa’s Emiliano Martinez was once again a key reason why
articles.content:
Emiliano Martinez has solidified himself as Argentina’s number one and with the form he has displayed in this international break, it comes as no surprise.

articles.title: World Cup qualifiers: Brazil, Argentina register contrasting wins to keep firm hold on direct qualifying spot
articles.description: Leaders Brazil easily defeated Uruguay 4-1 in their South American World Cup qualifying match while second-place Argentina beat Peru 1-0 a few hours earlier and are also close to clinching a direct qualifying berth.

articles.title: FIFA World Cup Qualifying: Lautaro Martinez extends Argentina's run to 25 unbeaten, Brazil thrash Uruguay
articles.description: Brazil top the single South American qualifying group by six points from Argentina, who have a nine point gap to those that could deny them a berth at Qatar 2022.
articles.content:
Brazil top the single South American qualifying group by six points from Argentina, who have a nine point gap to those that could deny them a berth at Qatar 2022.

articles.title: Rains help Argentine corn sowing as farmers grumble about export policy
articles.description: By Hugh BronsteinBUENOS AIRES, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Rains in central Argentina have helped farmers plant 2021/22 corn with 23.2% of expected area sown so far, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said on Thursday, while growers wrestle with a new export policy that they say could force them to plant less.The key corn-growing provinces of San Luis and Cordoba are enjoying good ground
articles.content:
By Hugh Bronstein
BUENOS AIRES, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Rains in central Argentina have helped farmers plant 2021/22 corn with 23.2% of expected area sown so far, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said on Thursday, while growers wrestle with a new export p... [2001 chars]
